title: Andrew Western – 2022 Comments on Winning the Stretford and Urmston By-Election
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Western, the new Labour MP for Stretford and Urmston, on Twitter on 16 December 2022.
content:
Thank you to everyone who has been in touch – I’m really overwhelmed.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

Just getting ready for my first constituency visit, but wanted to say thank you to everyone who voted for me yesterday and the amazing @LabourNorthWest team for all their incredible support.
